structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Sales, Mortgages And Leases Of Real Estate By Executors, Administrators, Guardians And Conservators

law.text: A foreign executor, administrator, guardian or conservator who has been licensed to sell real estate shall, except as otherwise provided, give notice of the time and place of sale, and otherwise proceed as is provided for an executor, administrator, guardian or conservator, appointed in this commonwealth; and the evidence of such notice may be perpetuated in the same manner.
